question: 殴る
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>assault</kanji>. What are some ways to assault a person? How about <vocabulary>to punch</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>to strike</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>to hit</vocabulary>, to name a few?
sourceReadingMnemonic: Someone is <reading>nag</reading>ging (<ja>なぐ</ja>) you and nagging you about something. You can't take it any more, so you turn around <vocabulary>to punch</vocabulary> them in the face.
